resources.string: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS histories_views (id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , id_history TEXT, visto INT(2),num_fotos INT(2))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS histories (id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , id_history TEXT, fecha TEXT,nombre_pet TEXT,id_pet TEXT,id_propietary TEXT,uris_photos TEXT)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS pets (id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , id_pet TEXT, name_pet TEXT,id_propietary int,name_propietary TEXT,raza TEXT,peso TEXT,color TEXT,genero TEXT, descripcion TEXT,edad TEXT,rating INT,type_pet INT,url_foto TEXT,url_photo_tumbh TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS propietary (id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY ,id_propietary TEXT,name_propietary TEXT, descripcion TEXT,url_photo TEXT,rating REAL,followers INT,posts INT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS razas (id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY , name_eng TEXT, nam_esp TEXT,id_type_pet INT)
CREATE TABLE saved_posts(id INT INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,id_from_web INT, name_pet TEXT,name_user TEXT,urls_posts TEXT, url_photo_user TEXT, description TEXT,date_post TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notifications(id INTEGER AUTO INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,title TEXT,body TEXT,url_resource TEXT, type_notification INT,id_usuario INT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS relacion_follows (id_document TEXT,url_photo_user TEXT,name_user,uuid_user TEXT, id_user INT,name_nip_user TEXT)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS relacion_favorite_pets (id_document TEXT,url_photo_user TEXT,name_user,uuid_user TEXT, id_user INT,name_nip_user TEXT,id_pet INT,name_pet TEXT,url_photo_pet TEXT)
